recruitment.subtitleRound: You want to join ElecIT Engineering but no current offer matches your profile
recruitment.heroSubtitle: Join a young and talented team and contribute with your expertise to a vision focused on technological innovation, professionalism and progress.
recruitment.step1Description: We evaluate the compliance of your CV (in French and English), cover letter and diplomas.
recruitment.step2Description: A phone interview is conducted beforehand to get to know you better.
recruitment.step3Description: An in-person interview will take place between managers and you on various topics.
recruitment.step4Description: Candidates may be given a test to measure their technical skills.
recruitment.step5Description: The selected candidate(s) will be called back for a job offer.

smartBuilding.title: SMART BUILDING
smartBuilding.subtitle: Custom solutions for homes, offices, hotels and commercial spaces. Comfort, security, energy performance and connectivity combined in intelligent architecture.

smartHome.title: The home that adapts to you
smartHome.featureDescription: Automatically control all your connected devices. With an integrated home automation system, manage your home functions on site or remotely via mobile app.

smartVilla.subtitle: Home automation system installation for centralized control of all habitat equipment.
smartVilla.descriptionRound: You have a house, hotel, office, commercial space or event hall to transform? Let's talk.

interfaceCommande.title: Control interfaces
interfaceCommande.featureDescription: Control your lighting, shutters, air conditioning, cameras and sound systems from home or remotely.

prestations.title: Associated services
prestations.subtitle: Our services cover the entire mechanical and metal fabrication process, from technical study to final coating, ensuring reliable, durable and customized realizations.

prestations.title:
Design &
Engineering office
prestations.description: 3D modeling and numerical simulation, custom manufacturing plans, rapid prototyping.

prestations.title:
Fabrication &
Assembly
prestations.description: Milling, welding, laser cutting, machining, assembly of metal structures in workshop or on site.

prestations.title:
Treatments
& Finishes
prestations.description: Surface coating (painting, anodizing, galvanizing); quality control and metrology.
These services accompany every project step, from initial audit to real-time supervision, transforming traditional infrastructures into intelligent, secure and energy-efficient environments.

audit.title: Infrastructure audit & diagnosis
audit.description: Evaluation of existing systems (electrical, HVAC, security, etc.); Energy analysis and optimization levers identification.

conception.title: Design & intelligent solutions engineering
conception.description: Technical study and modeling; Integration of sensors, controllers, and regulation systems.

automatisation.title: Building systems automation
automatisation.description: Centralized technical management: lighting, heating, ventilation, security; intelligent scenario programming

securite.title: Smart security & access control
securite.description: Intelligent video surveillance, connected alarm, biometrics; Traceability and people flow management

supervision.title: Remote supervision & predictive maintenance
supervision.description: Cloud platforms for 24/7 monitoring; Early anomaly detection and preventive maintenance.

formation.title: User training
formation.description: Team training on system operation; Documentation and dedicated technical support.

evolution.title: System evolution & scalability
evolution.description: Ability to add new features (modularity); Software updates and adaptation to new needs.

FabriMeca.heroSubtitle: Our workshop designs standard or customized devices and machines according to your specifications

expertise.title: Our areas of expertise
expertise.subtitle: We offer comprehensive solutions for the design, fabrication and assembly of metal and mechanical parts, as well as rolling equipment and containers, combining quality and precision.

expertises.title: Rolling equipment
expertises.description: Design and fabrication of carts, trailers, motorized or manual platforms.

expertises.title: Machines
expertises.description: Industrial, sanitary and commercial machines designed according to your specific needs

expertises.title: Infrastructures & Metal parts
expertises.description: Metal structures, stairs, railings, machined or welded mechanical parts.

fab.subtitleRound: Our team is ready to listen to bring your ideas to life and offer personalized support.

gpsT.descriptionhero: Modern, scalable tracking solutions adapted to the needs of individuals, businesses and institutions, both nationally and internationally (CEMAC area).
gpsT.DescriptionFeatures: Solutions designed for precise tracking, in-depth analysis and sustainable optimization of your vehicle fleet and all your assets, all centralized in a single platform.
gpsT.descriptionRound: Our experts support you from study to complete implementation of your tracking devices

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose us?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Our tracking solutions offer concrete benefits in visibility, security and operations optimization, for better real-time control of your resources.
whyChooseUs.feature1: Remote immobilization/anti-theft system included free of charge.
whyChooseUs.feature2: Access to licensed web platform and/or dedicated mobile app.
whyChooseUs.feature3: All parameters and management tools accessible without additional fees.
whyChooseUs.feature5: Maintenance, servicing and after-sales intervention offered in Douala and Yaoundé.
whyChooseUs.feature6: Up to 1 year warranty on equipment.

projectsData.title: Mobile Bank
projectsData.shortDescription: Custom solutions for data analysis, program design, as well as network and database management.
projectsData.description: Design and manufacture of a custom fleet of vehicles for safe and comfortable transportation of company personnel.
projectsData.utilite: This project addresses the critical need for smooth internal mobility, reducing team travel time on site, while ensuring their safety and comfort.
projectsData.retourClient: Thanks to these new means of transport, we have reduced internal travel delays by 30%, while improving the comfort of our employees.

projectsData.title: IT Services & DATA
projectsData.shortDescription: Custom solutions for data analysis, program design, as well as network and database management.
projectsData.description: Implementation of a complete IT infrastructure for real-time data management and analysis.
projectsData.utilite: Improved productivity and decision-making through advanced analytics tools.
projectsData.retourClient: The implementation of this solution has transformed the way we work and increased our efficiency by 40%.

projectsData.title: Smart security system
projectsData.shortDescription: Custom solutions for data analysis, program design, as well as network and database management.
projectsData.description: Installation of an intelligent surveillance and access control system for an administrative building.
projectsData.utilite: Ensure the safety of occupants and property while optimizing access management.
projectsData.retourClient: The peace of mind provided by this system is invaluable to our organization.

projectsData.title: Industrial IoT platform
projectsData.shortDescription: Custom solutions for data analysis, program design, as well as network and database management.
projectsData.description: Development of an IoT platform to monitor and optimize production processes.
projectsData.utilite: Reduced downtime and improved operational efficiency.
projectsData.retourClient: This solution has allowed us to reduce our maintenance costs by 25%.

projectsData.title: Enterprise network infrastructure
projectsData.shortDescription: Custom solutions for data analysis, program design, as well as network and database management.
projectsData.description: Complete overhaul of network infrastructure to support company growth.
projectsData.utilite: Ensure reliable and high-performance connectivity for all services.
projectsData.retourClient: The new network has significantly improved our daily productivity.

projectsData.title: Process automation
projectsData.shortDescription: Custom solutions for data analysis, program design, as well as network and database management.
projectsData.description: Business process automation to improve operational efficiency.
projectsData.utilite: Free up time for teams and reduce human errors.
projectsData.retourClient: Automation has transformed the way we work on a daily basis.
